book.synopsis: While vacationing on St. Honore, Miss Marple is accosted by a strange man who offers to show her the picture of a murderer and is found dead the next day, prompting Miss Marple to delve into the mystery. Reissue.
book.dimensions: Height: 7 Inches, Length: 4.5 Inches, Weight: 0.25 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
